Package Lab3

Class Vector3D

java.lang.Object
Lab3.Vector3D
public class Vector3D
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines a 3D vector
Author:
EECS2030

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Vector3D()
    Creates the vector (0.0, 0.0, 0.0).
    Vector3D​(double x, double y, double z)
    Creates the vector (x, y, z).
    Vector3D​(Vector3D vect)
    Creates a vector with the same components as another vector.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vector3D add​(Vector3D other)
    Adds a vector to this vector and changes the components of this vector.
    double dotProduct​(Vector3D other)
    computes the DOT product of this vector and the given vector
    boolean equalTo​(Vector3D other, double threshold)
    Determines if the difference between the magnitude of this vector and the other vector is smaller than the given threshold.
    double getX()
    Returns the x component of the vector.
    double getY()
    Returns the y component of the vector.
    double getZ()
    Returns the z component of the vector.
    double magnitude()
    Computes the magnitude of this vector.
    Vector3D scalarMultiplication​(double scalar)
    Multiplies this vector by a scalar.
    void setX​(double x)
    Sets the x component of the vector.
    void setY​(double y)
    Sets the y component of the vector.
    void setZ​(double z)
    Sets the z component of the vector.
    Vector3D subtract​(Vector3D other)
    Subtracts a vector from this vector and changes the components of this vector.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a string representation of the vector as [x, y, z], where x, y and z are teh components of teh vector.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vector3D

      public Vector3D()
      Creates the vector (0.0, 0.0, 0.0). This is the default constructor.

    • Vector3D

      public Vector3D​(double x, double y, double z)
      Creates the vector (x, y, z).
      Parameters:
      x - is the x-component of the vector
      y - is the y-component of the vector
      z - is the z-component of the vector

    • Vector3D

      public Vector3D​(Vector3D vect)
      Creates a vector with the same components as another vector. This is the copy constructor.
      Parameters:
      other - is a vector used to copy the components from

  • Method Details

    • getX

      public double getX()
      Returns the x component of the vector.
      Returns:
      the x component of the vector.

    • setX

      public void setX​(double x)
      Sets the x component of the vector.
      Parameters:
      x -
      x - the new value of the x component.

    • getY

      public double getY()
      Returns the y component of the vector.
      Returns:
      the y component of the vector.

    • setY

      public void setY​(double y)
      Sets the y component of the vector.
      Parameters:
      y - the new value of the y component.

    • getZ

      public double getZ()
      Returns the z component of the vector.
      Returns:
      the z component of the vector.

    • setZ

      public void setZ​(double z)
      Sets the z component of the vector.
      Parameters:
      z - the new value of the z component.

    • add

      public Vector3D add​(Vector3D other)
      Adds a vector to this vector and changes the components of this vector. To add, the counterpart components are added together.
      Parameters:
      other - is the vector that is added to this vector.
      Returns:
      the current Vector3D object

    • subtract

      public Vector3D subtract​(Vector3D other)
      Subtracts a vector from this vector and changes the components of this vector. To subtract, the counterpart components are subtracted.
      Parameters:
      other - is the vector that is subtracted from this vector.
      Returns:
      this Vector3D object

    • scalarMultiplication

      public Vector3D scalarMultiplication​(double scalar)
      Multiplies this vector by a scalar.
      Parameters:
      scalar - is the scalar that is multiplied by this vector
      Returns:
      this vector after multiplication

    • dotProduct

      public double dotProduct​(Vector3D other)
      computes the DOT product of this vector and the given vector
      Parameters:
      other - is the given vector, whose DOT product with this vector is given
      Returns:
      the DOT product of this and the other vector.

    • magnitude

      public double magnitude()
      Computes the magnitude of this vector.
      Returns:
      the magnitude of this vector.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the vector as [x, y, z], where x, y and z are teh components of teh vector.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the vector

    • equalTo

      public boolean equalTo​(Vector3D other, double threshold)
      Determines if the difference between the magnitude of this vector and the other vector is smaller than the given threshold.
      Parameters:
      other - the other vector that is compared with this vector
      threshold - a positive double, which shows the accepted magnitude difference between the two vectors
      Returns:
      true if the difference between magnitude of the two vectors is less than threshold and false otherwise
